text: "Today I Am a Clown" is the 6th episode of The Simpsons 15th season. It was first broadcast on the Fox network on December 7, 2003. The episode was written by Joel H. Cohen. Nancy Kruse is the director of the episode. In the episode, Krusty the Clown gets help from his father Hyman to have a bar mitzvah. Jackie Mason is a guest star as Krusty's father, Hyman Krustofsky. Mr. T guest stars as himself in the episode. About 10.5 million people watched the episode when it was first broadcast. Dan Castellaneta got an Emmy Award for being the voice actor for many characters in the episode. Joel H. Cohen was given a nomination for a Writers Guild of America Award because he wrote the episode. == References == == Other websites == * * Category:The Simpsons (season 15) episodes Category:2003 television episodes
